# example-container


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                          | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `fluid`  | `fluid`   | Container stretches to fill the width of the browser window if true. | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description       |
| ---- | ----------------- |
|      | Container content |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                  | Description                         |
| --------------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `--example-max-width` | Max-width of the Container          |
| `--example-padding-x` | Horizontal padding of the Container |
